body_html: The named_* functions with immediate_child=True wouldn't recurse on submodules -- i.e. it would only give you the named parameters/buffers/whatever that are direct members of the self module.
body_text: The named_* functions with immediate_child=True wouldn't recurse on submodules -- i.e. it would only give you the named parameters/buffers/whatever that are direct members of the self module.
body: The named_* functions with immediate_child=True wouldn't recurse on submodules -- i.e. it would only give you the named parameters/buffers/whatever that are direct members of the `self` module.
